hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that:The Prophet (ﷺ) said: "Whoever sends salah upon me once, Allah (SWT) will send salah upon him tenfold

chapter.ara-name: باب الْفَضْلِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of sending salah upon the Prophet (ﷺ)
